title: TV Icon UI/UX
custom_preconds: GIVEN that the user opened the app (TV icon is visible in many tabs of the app)

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user taps on TV icon
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the app will display the following:

* Class picker
* Date (Day Month Date)
* Arrows to navigate through the date (next/previous date) (iOS only)
* Video list (if available depending on the selected date)
* Done button

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user taps on TV icon
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the wait time for the page to load will not be longer than 5 secs

THEN the user will be able to scroll through the page smoothly

THEN the app will display the content of that tab neatly (no typographical errors, no overlapping and/or missing icons/texts)

THEN the users will be able to click on buttons/elements and these will work

title: Triple-A
custom_preconds: GIVEN that the user navigated to TV Icon
custom_expected:
THEN the app will update the information in the Video List

THEN the app will display the games for the teams in Triple-A Class only

title: Double-A
custom_preconds: GIVEN that the user navigated to TV Icon
custom_expected:
THEN the app will update the information in the Video List

THEN the app will display the games for the teams in Double-A Class only

custom_preconds: GIVEN that the user navigated to TV Icon
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects "Class A Advanced"
custom_expected:
THEN the app will update the information in the Video List

THEN the app will display the games for the teams in Class A Advanced only

title: Class A
custom_preconds: GIVEN that the user navigated to TV Icon
custom_expected:
THEN the app will update the information in the Video List

THEN the app will display the games for the teams in Class A only

custom_expected:

custom_preconds: GIVEN that the user navigated to TV Icon
custom_expected:
THEN the app will update the information in the Video List

THEN the app will display the games for the teams in Rookie Class only

title: iOS - Tapping on the Date
custom_preconds: GIVEN that the user navigated to TV Icon

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user taps on displayed date
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the app will display the date picker with month, day, and year picker on it

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user taps on "Done"
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the app will save the user's selected date

THEN the date picker will collapse

THEN the app will update the date displayed

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user taps on "Cancel"
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the date picker will collapse

THEN the app will retain the date displayed

title: iOS - Next/Previous Arrows
custom_preconds: GIVEN that the user navigated to TV Icon

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user taps on Next (>) arrow
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the user will be able to navigate on the next day of the displayed date

THEN the app will update the displayed date

THEN the app will update the Video List

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user taps on Previous (<) arrow
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the user will be able to navigate on the previous day of the displayed date

THEN the app will update the displayed date

THEN the app will update the Video List

title: Android - Tapping on the Date
custom_preconds: GIVEN that the user navigated to MiLB.TV page

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user taps on the date
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the app will display the calendar

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user taps on next/previous buttons
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the app will go to the next/previous month

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user taps on a date in the calendar
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the date will be highlighted by a blue circle

THEN the date at the top of the calendar will be updated

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user taps on 'OK'
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the app will collapse the calendar

THEN the app will save the newly selected date

THEN the app will update the video list

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user taps on 'Cancel'
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the app will collapse the calendar

THEN the app will retain the selected date

THEN the app will retain the video list

title: Video List UI
custom_preconds: GIVEN that the user opened the app (TV icon is visible in many tabs of the app)

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user taps on TV icon
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the video list will display the following:

* Matchup team (Dodgers @ Missions)
* Time of the matchup / Status of the matchup / Live icon / Archive icon

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the time hits 10AM ET
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the status of the game should flip

title: User Taps on a Video - No Account Logged In, No Entitlement
custom_preconds: GIVEN that the user has no MiLB.TV account
custom_steps: WHEN the user taps on a video
custom_expected:
THEN the user will not be able to play the videos

THEN the app will display the Paywall page (for iOS)

THEN the app will display the User Account page (for Android)

title: User Taps on a Video - Existing Account Logged In, No Entitlement
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that the user has a MiLB.TV account

GIVEN that the user has no entitlement/purchased subscription
custom_steps: WHEN the user taps on a video
custom_expected:
THEN the user will not be able to play the videos

THEN the app will display the Paywall page (for iOS)

THEN the app will display the 'No Entitlement' Message (for Android)

title: User Taps on a Video - Existing Account Logged In, With Entitlement
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that the user has a MiLB.TV account

GIVEN that the user has an entitlement/purchased subscription
custom_steps: WHEN the user taps on a video
custom_expected: THEN the user will be able to see and play the video

title: Video Player UI
custom_preconds: GIVEN that the user tapped on a video

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the video starts playing
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the play will display the Video Player Options with the following:

* X button
* Fit-to-screen button
* Speaker button
* Video duration 
* Screen mirror button
* Rewind/Play/Next buttons
* Audio and Subtitles button

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the video plays for 3 seconds
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the app will hide the video player options

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user taps on the screen
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the app will display the Video Player Options again

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user taps on X button
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the app will dismiss the video player

THEN the user will be brought back to the video list

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user taps on fit-to-screen button
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the app will display the video fitted to the screen

THEN the app will display the video to the original view once the button is tapped again

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user taps on speaker button
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the app will mute the audio of the video

THEN the app will unmute the audio of the video once the button is tapped again

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user toggles along the video duration line
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the app will display the frame pertaining to that selected time of the video

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user taps on screen mirroring button
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the app will display the screen mirroring pop up

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user taps on rewind button
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the app will display the frame 15 seconds before the current frame and will continue playing the video from there

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user taps on play/pause button
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the app will display the video accordingly to the play/pause button's state

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user taps on forward button
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the app will display the last frame of the selected video

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user taps on audio and subtitles button
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the app will display the subtitles and cc menu
